tool_description: This api shows hotels across Iraq, including pricing details, precise locations, room images, and guest ratings
name: Iraqi Hotel Finder
title: Iraqi Hotel Finder

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://iraqi-hotel-finder.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "iraqi-hotel-finder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://iraqi-hotel-finder.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "iraqi-hotel-finder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
